main event: A sighting of a ball of light approximately 15 feet in diameter which left a trail and then exploded was reported over Montreal and Prestwick on 2 November 1956.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a white star with a gold background descending to 17,000 feet,The sighting was reported by multiple aircraft in the area with similar descriptions around the same time,There were four sightings recorded on the same date,The object left a trail before exploding,There were ongoing military rocket test firings in the area at the time of the sighting.
